Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - Horn Briton Ferry. Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 3 bands competed Welsh League Champions—Briton Ferry Runners Up—Severn Tunnel
